question: Which organisation is the implementing agency for Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana?
option1: Bureau of Pharma PSUs of India
answer: Bureau of Pharma PSUs of India
explanation:
Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana (PM-BJP) is an initiative of the Department of Pharmaceuticals, under which quality medicines are provided to the general public at affordable cost. This scheme is being implemented through Bureau of Pharma PSUs of India (BPPI).
The organisation is celebrating the 3rd Janaushadhi Diwas on 7th March 2021, with the theme being “Seva bhi – Rozgar bhi”.
